import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Request pix statement export file.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/reports/pix-statement/exports"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get pix statement by wallet and date range. If no date range is provided, the current date will be considered. Fill in the Pix statement details in the parameters below and execute the request to obtain the file ID. Enter the generated file ID in the 'storage/:id/download' endpoint to download the pix statement in CSV format.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"created_at_start","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Pix statement created at start.","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"created_at_end","required":false,"in":"query","description":"Pix statement created at end.","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Header Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"x-wallet-uuid","in":"header","description":"Sender Wallet UUID (if empty, your default Wallet UUID will be settled)","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"nonce","in":"header","description":"The nonce ID is a UUID (v4) used to uniquely identify the requisition. All requisitions must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Pix statement generated successfully.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"file_id"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"File ID.","example":"f6e2e084-29b9-4935-a059-5473b13033aa"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"created_at"} required={true} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"format":"date-time","type":"string","description":"File created at.","example":"2024-03-30T10:44:29.768Z"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"file_id\": \"f6e2e084-29b9-4935-a059-5473b13033aa\",\n  \"created_at\": \"2024-03-30T10:44:29.768Z\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

If any required params are missing or has invalid format or type.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"401"} value={"401"}><div>

User authentication failed.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"422"} value={"422"}><div>
